pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, September 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, September 2, 2016:

Shanghai, People’s Republic of China

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with executives of Fosun and Cirque du Soleil.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with women entrepreneurs.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit with students of Shanghai Nanyang Model Private High School with Mr. Yao Ming.

Shanghai Nanyang Model Private High School
1118 Tian Yao Qiao Road
Xuhui District
Shanghai, China

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the launch of the Manulife-Sinochem “Manu-Move” Initiative and 20th Anniversary Celebration and will deliver brief remarks.

Chang’an Ballroom, 3rd floor
Pudong Shangri-La Hotel
33 Fu Cheng Road
Shanghai, China

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Canada Tourism Reception on the Huangpu River.

Note for media:

  •  Closed to media


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
